meaningMnemonic: The <radical>dog</radical> radical and <kanji>dog</kanji> kanji are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: You see an emu running towards you from off in the distance (strange to see an emu in these parts...). As it gets closer, you realize that it's not an emu at all, it's something that sounds the same, or similar... an <reading>inu</reading>! (いぬ)
